<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2628</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">THe forces acting on a plane in motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kräfte, die auf einer Fläche in der Bewegung
fungieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les forces agissant sur un avion dans le 
mouvement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As forças que agem em um plano no movimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le forze che si comportano su un aereo nel 
movimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">THe δυνάμεις που ενεργούν σε ένα αεροπλάνο στην 
κίνηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las fuerzas que actúan en un plano en el 
movimiento</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation demonstrating forces of lift, thrust, and drag on the weight of an airoplane in motion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force and motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die Kräfte des Hebers, des 
Schubes und der Gegenkraft auf dem Gewicht eines airoplane in der 
Bewegung zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation démontrant des forces d'ascenseur, 
de poussée, et de drague sur le poids d'un airoplane dans le 
mouvement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstra forças do elevador, da
pressão, e do arrasto no peso de um airoplane no movimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra le forze 
dell'elevatore, della spinta e della resistenza sul peso di un 
airoplane nel movimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταδεικνύοντας δυνάμεις μιας ζωτικότητας του 
ανελκυστήρα, της ώθησης, και της έλξης στο βάρος ενός 
airoplane στην κίνηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra fuerzas de la 
elevación, del empuje, y de la fricción en el peso de un airoplane 
en el movimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft und Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force et mouvement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força e movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza e movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη και κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecánicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza y movimiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
